Package org.ten60.netkernel.xml.xda

Interface Summary
IXDA Xpath Document API
IXDAIterator An IXDA that can move over a set of context nodes with in document
IXDAReadOnly  
IXDAReadOnlyIterator An IXDA that can move over a set of context nodes with in document
IXPathImplementation Abstract xpath evaluation engine
IXPathResult The result of evaluating an XPath expression on IXDA
 

Class Summary
DOMPrefixResolver A PrefixResolver that works with with namespaces and is cacheable
DOMXDA Implementation of IXDA, IXDAIterator, IXDAReadOnly and IXDAReadOnlyIterator using DOM
DOMXPathImplementation Wrapper around evaluation of xpaths using xalan.
DOMXPathResult Implementation of IXPathResult
TestDOMXDA  
 

Exception Summary
XDOIncompatibilityException Thrown when a given XDA implementation doesn't implement a called optional method
XPathImplementationException Thrown when an IXPathImplementation fails
XPathLocationException
